sub_fields.label: Map Embed
sub_fields.name: map_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Iframe from share i.e. ZeeMaps or GoogleMaps <iframe style="width: 100%; height: 500px;" src="//www.zeemaps.com/pub?group=2273885&legend=1&x=-73.847682&y=40.722842&z=8" width="300" height="150" frameborder="0"> </iframe>

sub_fields.label: Does this module have a heading?
sub_fields.name: heading_option

sub_fields.label: Cover Image or Grid?
sub_fields.name: image_or_grid
sub_fields.instructions: If Cover Image is selected, the first image of the collection will be displayed in the article content. If Grid is selected, a grid of images will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Does this module have a heading?
sub_fields.name: heading_option

sub_fields.label: Video Embed
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Enter an embed code from Archive.org - e.g. <iframe src="https://archive.org/embed/howtolookatacity" width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>

sub_fields.label: Video Link
sub_fields.name: video_link
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a URL from Vimeo or YouTube - e.g. https://vimeo.com/138339274
